title: Apisalome Vota
text:
Apisalome Vota (born 6 October 1996) is an Fijian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, currently playing for the . His preferred position is <a href="Centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">centre</a>.
Professional career.
Vota was named in the Fijian Drua squad for the <a href="2022%20Super%20Rugby%20Pacific%20season">2022 Super Rugby Pacific season</a>. He had previously represented the Drua in the <a href="2018%20National%20Rugby%20Championship">2018 National Rugby Championship</a>.
